t_nmf_semaphore_type_id
[CM Engine Control API]

Definition of which type semaphore shall be used for the given Media Processor communication mechanism. More...

Collaboration diagram for t_nmf_semaphore_type_id:

Defines

#define LOCAL_SEMAPHORES   ((t_nmf_semaphore_type_id)0)
 Embedded MMDSP macrocell semaphore, so CM_ProcessMpcEvent(<coreId>) shall be called under ISR connected to local MMDSP IRQ0.
#define SYSTEM_SEMAPHORES   ((t_nmf_semaphore_type_id)1)
 Shared system HW Semaphores, so CM_ProcessMpcEvent(ARM_CORE_ID) shall be called under ISR connected to shared HW Sem Host IRQ.

Typedefs

typedef t_uint8 t_nmf_semaphore_type_id
 Fake enumeration type.

Detailed Description

Definition of which type semaphore shall be used for the given Media Processor communication mechanism.
